Referred to House Committee on Rules.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that a six month Congressional investigation be undertaken to study the Conrail System for the purpose of retaining Conrail on a cost-effective basis.

summary.text: Directs the appropriate Congressional committee to conduct a six month investigation of the problems associated with the management, labor, and facilities of the Consolidated Rail Corporation (Conrail). Prohibits Congress, for a specified time from enacting legislation that would lead to the dismemberment of Conrail.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that a six month Congressional investigation be undertaken to study the Conrail System for the purpose of retaining Conrail on a cost-effective basis.
